â–¬ â–¬ â–¬ â–¬ 
Advanced GSC Visualizer brings dynamic data visualization directly to your Google Search Console. With a single click, transform key metricsâ€”such as clicks, impressions, CTR, and average positionâ€”into interactive, customizable charts. Choose from bar, line, or area chart types and view data daily, weekly, or monthly.

Add trendlines and moving averages for deeper insights, and annotate charts by drawing vertical and horizontal lines, creating boxes, or adding text. All tools are integrated seamlessly, without storing or accessing any data outside of your Google Search Console environment.

â€¢ Annotate charts with lines, boxes, and text
â€¢ No data storage or sharing beyond your Google Search Console view
